src:
Yesayas Oktovianus Pesimistis PSSI Bakal Lebih Baik
02 Nov 2019, 16:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Yesayas Oktovianus angkat bicara soal hasil pemilihan Ketua Umum PSSI pada Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) 2019 ini. Mantan calon Ketua Umum PSSI tersebut menilai bahwa PSSI tidak akan lebih baik di bawah kepengurusan anyar ini.
"Dengan susunan yang seperti saat ini, saya rasa, hasilnya akan sama saja seperti periode lalu," ucap Yesayas, pada Bola.net.
"Bahkan, bisa jadi, hasilnya akan lebih buruk dari periode lalu," sambungnya.
Menurut Yesayas, prediksinya tersebut tak sekadar omong kosong. Wartawan senior ini menilai ada sejumlah hal yang bisa menjadi indikasi sepak bola Indonesia bakal tetap sulit berprestasi.
"Di PSSI, keputusan diambil secara kolektif kolegial di Komite Eksekutif. Sementara, saat ini, bisa dilihat bahwa orang-orang yang duduk di situ adalah muka-muka lama," ujar Yesayas.
"Apa yang bisa diharapkan dari mereka?" tukasnya.
Sebelumnya, Iwan Bule dipastikan terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI. Dalam pemilihan di ajang Kongres Luar Biasa, yang digelar di Jakarta, Sabtu (02/11), ia menang telak dari para pesaingnya.
Pada pemilihan ini, dari 85 voter, Iwan mendapat 82 suara. Sementara, Arif Putra Wicaksono dan para calon lainnya tak mendapat satu pun suara. Tiga suara lain dianggap tidak sah.
Pemilihan Ketua Umum ini sendiri hanya diikuti tiga calon saja. Selain Iwan Bule, ada sosok Arif Putra Wicaksono dan Rahim Soekasah. Sementara, tujuh calon lain -termasuk La Nyalla Mattalitti- sudah mengundurkan diri.
Sebagai pendamping Ketua Umum, terpilihlah Iwan Budianto dan Cucu Somantri sebagai wakil. Iwan mendapat 74 suara, sedangkan Cucu mendapat 81 suara.

Simak artikel selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Yesayas Oktovianus Pessimistic PSSI Will be Better
02 Nov 2019, 16:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Yesayas Oktovianus spoke about the election results of the PSSI Chairperson at the 2019 Extraordinary Congress (KLB). The former PSSI General Chairperson considered that PSSI would not be better under this new management.
"With the current arrangement, I think, the results will be the same as last period," Yesayas said on Bola.net.
"In fact, it could be, the results will be worse than last period," he continued.
According to Yesayas, the prediction is not just nonsense. This senior reporter assessed that there were a number of things that could be indicative of Indonesian football that it would remain difficult to achieve.
"At PSSI, collegial decisions are taken collectively in the Executive Committee. Meanwhile, at this time, it can be seen that the people sitting there are old faces," Yesayas said.
"What can be expected of them?" he said.
Previously, Iwan Bule was certain to be elected as the General Chair of PSSI. In the election at the Extraordinary Congress, which was held in Jakarta, Saturday (02/11), he won a landslide victory over his competitors.
In this election, from 85 voters, Iwan got 82 votes. Meanwhile, Arif Putra Wicaksono and the other candidates did not get any votes. Three other votes are considered invalid.
The election of the Chairperson itself was only followed by three candidates. In addition to Iwan Bule, there are figures of Arif Putra Wicaksono and Rahim Soekasah. Meanwhile, seven other candidates - including La Nyalla Mattalitti - have resigned.
As a companion to the General Chair, Iwan Budianto and Cucu Somantri were chosen as representatives. Iwan got 74 votes, while Cucu got 81 votes.
